verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] hosted his first White House dinner for Islam 's holy month of Ramadan after declining to host such a meal last year .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: hosted] [ARG1: his first White House dinner for Islam 's holy month of Ramadan] [ARGM-TMP: after declining to host such a meal last year] .
